title: SVSU Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Junior Engineer Post
description: The Shri Vishwakarma Skill University (SVSU) has published the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Junior Engineer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. in Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the SVSU Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates fill out th...
